summary: This document is a secure email communication regarding the closing of a mortgage loan for a client named Vickers. It includes instructions for the closing team and mentions the funding amount and required documents. The email emphasizes the importance of following the checklist to avoid issues with funding.

persons.name: Stephanie Schumacher
persons.context: Stephanie Schumacher is the sender of the email, providing instructions for the mortgage closing process.

persons.name: Carol Lindsley
persons.context: Carol Lindsley is a recipient of the email, responding with a revised HUD document.

persons.name: Vicki Greene
persons.context: Vicki Greene is included in the email correspondence as a recipient.

persons.name: Stacie Hitchens

persons.name: JoAnn Brown
persons.context: JoAnn Brown is copied on the email correspondence.

persons.name: Ronald J Antonelli
persons.context: Ronald J Antonelli is referenced as the attorney associated with the Law Office where Carol Lindsley works.

connections.description: Stephanie Schumacher is the lead in the mortgage closing team, while Carol Lindsley is a settlement coordinator working on the same case.
Carol Lindsley works at the Law Office of Ronald J Antonelli.

events.title: Mortgage Closing
events.description: The mortgage loan for Vickers is scheduled to be funded.

locations: 7990 Arco Corporate Drive, Suite 118, Raleigh, NC 27617
keyFacts: The funding amount for the mortgage loan is $318,576.94.
The email includes instructions for sending back required documents for review.
The communication emphasizes the importance of following the checklist to avoid funding issues.
The email contains confidential information and is intended only for the recipients listed.
